sentences.en: ...a monograph on her favourite author, John Updike.
sentences.cn: ...关于她最喜欢的作者约翰·厄普代克的一本专著。

sentences.en: But the monograph of the centralized treasury management about theories and method system is fewer.
sentences.cn: 但在理论研究和方法体系方面的专题研究还比较少.

sentences.en: But up to now, there is no domestic monograph on it.
sentences.cn: 但到目前为止, 国内尚无研究“互文性”问题的专著.

sentences.en: Dai Wangshu's poetics is not a monograph with self - contained system, but some fragmentary reading notes.
sentences.cn: 戴望舒的诗论不是体系完备的诗学专著, 而是一些零札片论.

sentences.en: Editor of a monograph published over 120 papers.
sentences.cn: 主编专著一部,发表论文120多篇.

sentences.en: He pioneered this approach - be warned, though, this is a monograph not a text book.
sentences.cn: 他是使用这方法的先驱, 然而本文应当算是个专题论文,并非教科书.

sentences.en: If prescribed, the successive withdrawal method is fully described in the monograph.
sentences.cn: 若指定, 连续的撤消方法在各论中完全叙述.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, the editors of the monograph should improve their own quality and planning level constantly.
sentences.cn: 同时, 作为专刊的编辑也要不断提高自身的素质,提高策划水平.

sentences.en: Taoist musical monograph is a book with traits of clear line of thought and original style.
sentences.cn: 摘要蒲亨强著的《道乐通论》一书具有脉络清晰,风格独特的特点.

sentences.en: The monograph has reference and direction values for companies in the power industries.
sentences.cn: 对工业品及行业内的公司也有一定的借鉴和指导作用.

sentences.en: The monograph is conceptually confused, unclear in its structure and weak in its methodology.
sentences.cn: 这篇专论概念混淆，结构不清，研究方法也经不起推敲。

sentences.en: The scientific and technical monograph is main a way of spreading modern science and techique.
sentences.cn: 科技专著是传播现代科学技术的重要栽体.

sentences.en: These statistics were culled from Dr. Donald T. Lunde's recent monograph, Murder and Madness.
sentences.cn: 以上统计数字是从唐纳德? 伦德医生最近的专题文章《凶杀和疯狂》摘录下来的.

sentences.en: This doctoral dissertation is a monograph on Dai Dong - yuan " philosophy and some interrelated questions about it. "
sentences.cn: 本文即是对 戴东原 的义理思想及其相关问题的专题性研究.

sentences.en: This monograph belongs to the category of serious popular books.
sentences.cn: 这本专著是一本较高深的普及读物.

sentences.en: This monograph is a primer to coal and biomass gasification technologies.
sentences.cn: 这个专题著作是煤和生物量气化技术的一本入门.

trans.tran_en: an article or short book that discusses a subject in detail
